MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: AI watermark removal, photo restoration, photo colorization, AI headshot generator, background remover
English.Char_Desc_250: Kaze.ai is an advanced AI-powered image editor for watermark removal, restoration, recolorization, and more.
English.Char_Desc_450: Kaze.ai is an advanced AI-powered image editing platform that helps you restore, enhance, and personalize photos easily. Features include AI watermark removal, background cleanup, colorization, and headshot generation.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Kaze.ai is a browser-based AI photo editing platform designed to help users handle professional image enhancement tasks with ease. Whether you need to remove watermarks, restore old photos, generate headshots, recolor black-and-white images, or remove backgrounds, Kaze.ai provides efficient tools in one place — no download required. It’s ideal for e-commerce sellers, content creators, photographers, and everyday users seeking quality results with minimal effort.

Site.Site_Description_100: Kaze.ai is an AI-powered image editor with watermark removal and headshot tools
Site.Site_Description_250: Kaze.ai offers browser-based photo enhancement and AI editing including watermark removal, recolorization, and background cleanup
Site.Site_Description_450: From content creators to e-commerce sellers, Kaze.ai helps you remove watermarks, restore images, generate AI headshots, and edit photos online with ease and precision
Site.Site_Keywords: AI photo editor, watermark remover, restore old photos, background remover, image recolorization, AI headshot

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: You may distribute the link to this platform for public access and review.
